1404710.name: Kosmos Connections
1404710.description:
✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧ *:・ﾟ✧

Welcome to the world of Kosmos! 

Or should I say "Welcome back?" I guess it doesn't really matter. In this place, the bonds you forge will open the 'locks' to come. "What does that mean," you ask? It will all make sense soon. For now, just go about your business as usual and enjoy your stay. But don't forget your ultimate goal...

The train will arrive soon.

Are you ready?"

✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧*:・ﾟ✧ *:・ﾟ✧

Kosmos Connections is a two-in-one visual novel that brings together the slice-of-life narrative of Kosmos and the science fiction short story, Uplink Alethia, into one complete tale of mystery, empathy, and trust. Each route contains elements of player choice. From choosing different locations around Kosmos with Tau, experiencing chance events with Runia, and making interpersonal connections with Jen, you can create a personal and intimate experience that makes your stay in Kosmos truly yours.

Uplink Alethia, meanwhile, is the story is about a young woman named Nona Mei, who is a part of the Pneuma Project. Together with Kazuhira Hatanaka and Ryuo Nakano, they have created the Soul Uplink, a device that uploads people’s souls to a digital world known as the Datascape. However, upon the first official test of the device, Nona finds something in the Datascape that shouldn’t be there; something that gives her a feeling of dread that she could lose all she holds dear. As you progress through this narrative, you will be able to discuss each chapter with Tau, the game’s creator, as well as your friends in order to ascertain the true nature of this little game.

Kosmos and Uplink… Will you be able to make the connections you need to reach the best possible ending?
